name: ERP-Software.org
overview:
ERP-Software.org is a website and info-portal about Enterprise Resource Management Software. It provides daily news about latest developements in the ERP Sector and Reviews of Software by several providers. The site does not only focus on the so called â€žBigERPâ€œ-Developers but also has an own category for KMU-ERP for smaller enterprises.

ERP-Software.org has become an influencal news page for everyone who is interested in business software. No matter if you are looking for Content Management System Software or Workflow-Management you will be lucky. The Page also has a huge glossary containing the main vocabulary of Business Process Management and ERP-Software which can be very useful.

The site also allows its users to subscribe to a RSS-Feed with the latest published news, reviews and comments. Evene the user himself is able to comment and to discuss with the ERP-Software.org’s authors.
